channel.title: Comments on: A totally different view on Lotusphere

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@1 - Great to meet you too as well John. I covered the market that was interested in big, tall and bald geeks. Gayle and Kitty covered the other 99.9999% of the population <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: @1 – Great to meet you too as well John. I covered the market that was interested in big, tall and bald geeks. Gayle and Kitty covered the other 99.9999% of the population http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

item.title: By: John Mackey
item.dc:creator: John Mackey
item.description: <p>Matt, it was great meeting you at Lotusphere. I really enjoyed your XPages session, it was great!<br /><br />...but, and please don't take this the wrong way, if you were the "booth babe" then I think you guys need to work on a better marketing plan...<img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJ8/$File/shocked.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt, it was great meeting you at Lotusphere. I really enjoyed your XPages session, it was great!

…but, and please don’t take this the wrong way, if you were the “booth babe” then I think you guys need to work on a better marketing plan…http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJ8/$File/shocked.gif“ />
